text: "Separate Ways (Worlds Apart)" is a 1983 song by Journey and is the leading single to their 8th studio album Frontiers. It went to number 6 in Hungary, number 8 in the United States, number 11 in Canada, number 15 in Poland, number 17 in South Africa, number 93 in Australia and number 95 in the United Kingdom. Category:1983 songs Category:Journey (band) songs Category:Daughtry (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Separate Ways (Worlds Apart)
